about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in the exhilarating pixel world of Atlas Wars, a cross-platform brawler game featuring intense battles for up to four players, both online and locally. Inspired by the captivating 3D character designs of Project Aurora, Atlas Wars brings these characters to life in a fresh, reimagined pixel art style.

Engage in a variety of exciting gameplay modes such as casual free-for-alls, 1x1 intense match-ups, competitive ranked matches, and exclusive private rooms to invite friends. Experience the thrill of fast-paced combat, pixle art visuals, and a diverse roster of fighters as you showcase your skills and climb the ranks. Join the Atlas Wars community today and embrace the challenge of this action-packed gaming experience



Features:
  • 2 to 4 players in Online Multiplayer
  • Local Multiplayer
  • 9 Powerful Heroes
  • Different Bot enemies difficulties (Easy, Medium, Hard)
  • Different Game Modes (Free For All, 1x1)
  • Over 5 unique levels
  • Lots of weapons!
